llm_res.rule: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.

transferFrom: Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The transferFrom method is used for a withdraw workflow, allowing contracts to transfer tokens on your behalf.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
balanceOf: Returns the account balance of another account with address _owner.
